items.title: Community cast 'does city proud' in culture finale
items.description: Thousands gather in Bradford for the first of two events bringing the curtain down on culture year.

items.title: US seizes vessel off Venezuela's coast, officials say
items.description: The move comes after US President Donald Trump ordered a "blockade" of sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela.

items.title: Engineer becomes first wheelchair user to go to space
items.description: "It was the coolest experience!" said Michaela Benthaus after the 10-minute Blue Origin flight.

items.title: Paul has titanium plates fitted after Joshua breaks his jaw
items.description: Jake Paul's jaw is broken in two places by Anthony Joshua during their heavyweight fight in Miami.

items.title: Thomas Skinner claims BBC rigged Strictly vote removing him
items.description: The former contestant alleges he received an "anonymous" email from a BBC executive with stats showing he received "far more" votes.
